title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message:
Hi guys!

I have a motherboard which has apparently been to another repair shop but they couldn't do anything with it.

No charging light is the issue. Works fine on battery though.

CHGR_CSO_P, CHGR_CSI_P and CHGR_CSI_N are only showing 1.2v.
CHGR_VCOMP and CHGR_ICOMP 2.8v (is this right?)
CHGR_BGATE 1.39v
PPDCIN_G3H_INRUSH_FET about 1.3v but drains slowly.

Any help greatly appreciated.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message:
Tried known good magsafe board?
PP3V42 present on AC only? ACOK present? Check voltage on C7005

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message:
Magsafe board(s) confirmed working.

C7005 pin 1 16.3v, pin 2 0v

How do I check if PP3V42 present on AC only? I checked R7012 pin 1 and it gave 3.4v with just charger, just battery and both battery and charger plugged in - is that what you mean?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message: No - sorry, I missed that in your original question.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message: ACIN voltage on U7000? Resistance to GND on BC_ACOK line? R5087 pull up resistor ok?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message:
ACIN 3.9v
Resistance to GND BC_ACOK
R5087 = 480k ohm, 0.28v

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message: Check resistance of R7005. If it is ok then replace ISL6259.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message: I got this board working. I replaced ISL6259 and also had to make jumpers between C4903 and C4908 but also a really long jumper between C4902 and C6999. Is there a physically shorter jumper I can make than that?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B no charger light
message: No idea about the jumpers, check board view for closest 3V42 points.
